website_summaries.verdict: Though it lacks a certain pizazz, the oversized LG G Vista smartphone delivers the big-screen goods for small budgets.

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Priced Phablet!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is everything I was looking for. It's fast, has a large 720p screen and has all the useful LG enhancements like knock code and auto back-up. I recommend the Fosmon DURA S Flexible Protective Skin Slim Fit Case for LG G Vista. I bought the clear one. It protects yet is still very thin and has a great rubbery grip feel. I recommend doing the firmware update to VS88011B if you purchase this phone. Just hook up the micro USB cable to your computer, load the software from the phone and follow the prompts. This is a fantastic large phone. Buy it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great phone that was easy to activate at Verizon.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used for $135 with a 30 day money back guarantee. It's for my 12 year old daughter. I was reluctant because it could be blacklisted, stolen or locked. I was happy to hear when there were no issues activating it at Verizon. It came in great condition. It has a big screen and no dings or scratches. It had no SIM card which cost $20 and a $40 activation fee because it was a 3rd line on our existing account. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best phablet on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice if you have fat fingers and don't care about games. I had two LG G3's and they seem to have resolved the screen issues those phones had. It may not sound like it, but the 5.7 is noticeably bigger than 5.5. Camera is not as nice as the G3, but good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: vegassubscribe

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone/decent price
customer_reviews.text: Got here early. Was in new condition as advertised...however id have prefered to remove my own stickers. Phone itself is ok. I purchased it as a back up phone for when my lgg4 quits on me. I hate having to go into att and haggle over a phone and walmart will no longer let you turn on a togo phone and see if you like it before purchasing and returning it is a hassle. This seemed to be a chance i could afford to take. My only "true" issue is the camera is awful. But the rest of the phone is decent and itll work for what I need it to. Which is to be a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No space for apps
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a ton to say about this phone. I've been using it for over a year now. The battery life at this point is atrocious, but that's not too surprising I guess. I like the big screen. What I have the biggest problem with is the amount of space. You can maybe put 8 apps on this phone before you're out of space. And since this doesn't have jellybean you can't use your SD card for much of anything. Way too small. You have to delete apps off and reinstall others over and over again. Buying a new phone now with tons more space.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well but would have like to have more memory. Compared to Verizon store price, well there is no comparison! Note that I don't use advance features (well at least to me) like playing music, social media and so forth. My interest is in basic smartphone us like it being a phone and basic apps like email, weather and news.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, used it for 3 months before switching carriers. I still have the phone reserved for being a backup for whatever reason. Very little scuffs or dings for being refurbished. Phone works great and has excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible phone, I couldn’t download apps cuz the memory was non existent and I could only take like 2 pics and if I tried to put in a SD card then it wouldn’t format it or even work, I bought a brand new sd card and it still didn’t work don’t buy this phone
customer_reviews.author: Ian Meisner

customer_reviews.title: Appeared pre-owned and tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: To start off with after purchasing this phone after not coming with a sim card and having to wait almost 3 years for it to be in stock I finally got it activated. For a large smartphone the apps and keyboard seem smaller than the last phone. Also small storage space leads to constant restarting all on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Has some flaws!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, but it definitely has its issues. Just recently started dropping calls. Signal will be at full strength (4 bars) and as soon as you dial signal drops to 1 bar and the call won't go through. Not sure if this is a service or phone issue, but none of our other phone do this and are under the same service. Battery seems to last pretty long, but I do not sit on my phone all day either. Touch screen is a little slow to respond, so be patient. Storage capacity..I'm not really sure because I don't download a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It messed up my computer
customer_reviews.text: I haven't completely set it up yet so I gave it less stars. I just got my computer to work again after trying to set the phone up. I advise others to get it set up with Verizon to prevent computer mess ups. All in all, I believe it is a good phone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like the phone. For the price we pay it is well worth. I bought the Verizon one. Be aware though you can use this phone only as a prepaid phone in Verizon. I had to switch from post-pay to pre-pay in order to switch to this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amalraj G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mama, I thought that it would be a great phone because of the big beautiful screen but after a month of having it the navigation keys stopped working which makes the phone almost impossible to use you have to keep turning it on and off.... it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jamilla

customer_reviews.title: Not enough memory for me
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone for almost 4 months and I've already ordered a new phone with more memory. If the only thing you need is a phone to make calls and texts, this is the phone for you. But if you want to take photos and download apps...spend the extra money and get a phone with more memory!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Very Small Amount of Memory
customer_reviews.text: The phone had an ok screen and was plenty big enough, but there wasn't enough memory. The phone was slow and there was a limited number of apps it would hold. It's probably a good thing that the phone's been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lyell

customer_reviews.title: Its a ok phone to much pre installed apps
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great but my only turn away is how much apps or pre installed that u cannot delete I have about 4-5 apps and I can't download more is really fustrating when I have to update my bank apps but their is no room in my memory even when I bought a microsim memory card
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A great smartphone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I L-O-V-E this phone!!! The perfect size. Love all the features. Nice big, clear, crisp screen. Call clarity...excellent! Texting and messaging...effortless! Battery life...great! Takes great pictures with front AND rear facing camera. Can browse the internet with no problems. I would recommend this phone to anyone looking for a (budget) smartphone with all the bells and whistles!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Lover

customer_reviews.title: I'm FAITHFUL TO AMAZON LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Dislike I can't Turn Off Phone ,Messenger FaceTime is so low , I Can't hear the Person,m talking to. Can't hear them ,unless I'm holding the phone against my ear @ All features are not What I'm use to Love the Size .Quality Not So Much Amazon CAN IMPROVE BETTER. After all said U ordered my Sister Veneers,I BELIEVE She will ENjoy I Personally LOVE AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Deyvada D. Scranton

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Amazon purchases that I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Amazon purchases that I have ever made. Phone arrived as described, in as-new condition and worked perfectly. I just swapped the SIM from my broken phone and I was back in business. No contract (I pay month to month) no store sales clerks, no exorbitant fees. Highly recommended! Awesome phone that runs forever.
customer_reviews.author: Artlight

customer_reviews.title: New phone
customer_reviews.text: This is all new to me. I just gave up my flip phone. I love my new phone. I still haven't figured out what it can all do. My niece is showing me how to work my new phone. It's pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Sovey

customer_reviews.title: nice phone
customer_reviews.text: nice phone not a lot of memory even with sd card only sertion apps will move to sd card but in all its a nice phone

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone just a couple days ago, and the seller shipped it fast, and it is perfect! Not a thing wrong with it! Thanks Traveltab it's perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Bad area good phone
customer_reviews.text: Works about as well as I expect any cell phone to work, as little as possible.I love in a dead zone n any phone only works once in awhile, weather has a lot to do with it so it's not the phone that don't work it's the area I'm in. Other wise the phone works great.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect shape. It was sold as "very good" as ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect shape. It was sold as "very good" as a used phone. It could have been sold as "like new". It was flawless and a month later, still not one problem with it. When I took it to Verizon for a sim card, the sales rep asked me where I bought my phones. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Is it new?
customer_reviews.text: The item I was shipped looked brand new in the box, new charger, cord, manual as well as the phone had protective covering and was wrapped like it came from the factory in an At&t box.I used this phone for 10 days and 10 gigabytes. It is perfect! Thank you

Bayshine Store sent me an almost brand new phone....and mines upgraded to Lollipop the same day I got it! Excellent battery life, and has many neat features for a budget phablet! My only complaint is the the 1.5 ram, but other than that a strong buy!

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone!! I refuse to buy high-end phones or contracts but wanted a larger smartphone that I could see easily and use to pull up documents and email for work. The camera on it is excellent, and I have had no issues with any of my apps working (Facebook, Messenger, Dropbox, Gmail, etc.) I use it with a Verizon prepaid contract.

customer_reviews.text: Great phone! If you're looking for a phablet on a budget than this is a great option. The screen is big and it has a lot of cool features like dual window. And i like that the buttons are on the back so it makes it easy to control.

customer_reviews.text: Favorite phone! Now all four family members have this phone and we love it! Size and features of the very expensive phones, but with a nicer price tag!

customer_reviews.title: Big Screen & Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone 2 weeks and switched from a flip phone so it is my first smart phone. This big screen phone has performed without any issues. It is used mostly at home on wi-fi and it transitions to wireless seamlessly. Picture and sound are excellent. The voice to text feature works flawlessly and is of great benefit, saving thumb time which I use only for minor editing. Touch screen works well with a light touch. It is a great value and I highly recommend it. The physical size to carry with is daunting but that is the price paid for a big screen. Wish it was possible to have a companion flip phone.
customer_reviews.author: Terry F.

customer_reviews.title: Great shipper. Awesome phone

The keyboard freezes constantly, theres not enough memory for anything after all the junk apps they force you to keep, I lost my ability to do a unlimited mobile hotspot, and this phone likes to drop the data connection randomly when using chrome, AND THE SOFTWARE IS ALREADY OBSOLETE FOR ALOT OF NEW APP UPDATES. I seriously regret buying this piece of junk.

My old phone had the button on the side, and was super thin, so trying to fumble it on when a call came in was always a challenge. The screen is big and beautiful and bright!

product_meta.title: LG G Vista (Verizon Prepaid)
product_meta.description: Style:Verizon WirelessThe LG G Vista offers a rich multimedia experience on the large 5.7-inch HD display. It's simple to multitask with the battery that offers all-day power and the quad-core processor that runs your apps with ease. Get a 4G LTE smartphone that feels good in your hand, with its convenient Rear Key. The LG G Vista comes in 8GB and is available in Black.
feature_bullets: Expand your horizons with the 5.7-inch HD display that offers realistic colors and superior readability. The large screen means more room to view your favorite pictures, videos, e-books, websites and more.
The removable 3,200 mAh battery keeps you powered up without adding bulk. So go ahead and browse the web, stream a movie and check email with the peace of mind that your battery has lasting power.
The 1.2 GHz quad-core processor offers the speed and performance to easily operate all your favorite apps. The LG G Vista handles processing tasks, large and small.
